name: Super Mario Bros
description:
The successor to the 1983 arcade game, Mario Bros., it was
  released in Japan in 1985
  for the Famicom,
  and in North America and Europe
  or the Nintendo Entertainment System(NES) in 1985 and 1987 respectively.
  Players control Mario,
  or his brother Luigi in the multiplayer mode,
  as they
  travel the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Toadstool from the antagonist,
  Bowser. & copy Nintendo 1985
